isis.stitle: CLUTCH CONTROL LINKAGE - 2000, 4000, 7000, AND 8000 SERIES - MAINTENANCE - INSPECTION

svcproc.title: INSPECTION
svcproc.para: At the time of vehicle chassis lubrication, check clutch pedal free travel. If free travel is less than 1.7" (43 mm), make necessary adjustments. Refer to ADJUSTMENT.

At least once each year and in the event of clutch service, inspect the clutch control linkage for worn or damaged parts. Worn yoke pins and yoke pin holes in the control rods and levers could affect linkage adjustment and clutch operation. Replace any worn or damaged parts. When installing new parts, clutch linkage should be lubricated and re-adjusted.
